body:
# Learn2Python is a video series designed around example-based teaching for Python.

## Lessons
The Lessons are publicly available on YouTube.

[**Lecture 1**](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dbHp79uRvwc)

[**Lecture 2**](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dbHp79uRvwc)

## Exercises
Exercises are also publicly availible on YouTube. They are released one day after the corresponding lecture is released.

[**Exercise 1**](http://youtu.be/b8xkKOsPAiw)

## Lesson Downloads
All Python files are hosted on transparently on Gist. It contains every python file you need to follow along. Study guides are hosted on Dropbox and can be downloaded by right clicking the link and clicking "save as".

* Lesson 1

[**Lesson 1 Python Files**](https://gist.github.com/2898772)

[**Lesson 1 Study Guide**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/08nnihoypdt4ykn/Lesson%20One%20-%20Printing%20and%20Functioning%20-%20Study%20Guide.pdf)

* Lesson 2

[**Lesson 2 Python Files**](https://gist.github.com/3286386)

[**Lesson 2 Study Guide**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/08nnihoypdt4ykn/Lesson%20One%20-%20Printing%20and%20Functioning%20-%20Study%20Guide.pdf)

## Contact
Do you have questions you need answered or suggestions on what to teach next? Fill out a [form](http://bit.ly/l2docomments) and I'll do my best to accommodate your requests!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Learn2Python
